page.title: 03ECOLOGY
page.content:
Roe deer are found in the woods and thickets that are found dotted around the countryside.The population isfairly low and increasing slowly. Shooting deer is banned if you do not own a .303 rifle although they damage young corn and other crops.Deer are sometimes stalked as a sport and there can be a heavy fine if a killed or trapped deer is found on your land . Poaching deer is not common practise but venison is eaten quite frequently nowadays.
Badgers are mainly nocturnal animals,this means they come out at night.A badger will attack a predetor much bigger than itself to protect its young.A badger does not build warrens but lives in pairs.The young leave the set and has to fend for itself at twelve weeks.
